mapper.insert: INSERT INTO passengers ( product_no_dep, product_no_des, passenger_name, first_name, last_name, gender, pin_type, birth, phone, email ) VALUES ( #{productNoDep}, #{productNoDes}, #{passengerName}, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{gender}, #{pinType}, #{birth}, #{phone}, #{email} )
